content:
While it's still daytime on <color=#97c344>{homestar} Street</color>,
it might already be nighttime somewhere else.
I just realized this when I was listening to the radio earlier!

content:
I understand why salt, oil, soy sauce, and vinegar are grouped together since they're essential cooking ingredients.
But why add "tea" at the end of that list?

but that won't stop me from hopping on a stool
and stir-frying with a heavy wok like a pro!

content:

Being just one minute late getting home
Meant missing the best part of my favorite cartoons!
